HE purpose of this book is to give such information regard- ing the history and development of the Latin language as experience has shown to be of service to advanced students. The subjects treated are the Latin Alphabet, Pronunciation. Hidden Quantity‚ Accent, Orthography‚ The Latin Sounds, inflections, Adverbs and Prepositions‚ and Syntax. Of these subjects, those of Hidden Quantity, Inflections, and Syntax re- eeive special attention; and the results of recent investigation are set forth fully and clearly, but in compact form.
